00016 #include "outk/ui/Button.h"
00017 #include "outk/ui/Widget.h"
00018 #include "outk/ui/Image.h"

00020 namespace outk
00021 {
00022 namespace ui
00023 {
00025         class WidgetFactory
00026         {
00027         public:
00028                 virtual Widget* createWidget(omega::String name, Widget* parent)
00029                 {
00030                         Widget* widget = new Widget(name);
00031                         parent->addChild(widget);
00032                         return widget;
00033                 }
00034 
00035                 virtual Box* createBox(omega::String name, Widget* parent, Box::Layout layout)
00036                 {
00037                         Box* box = new Box(name, layout);
00038                         parent->addChild(box);
00039                         return box;
00040                 }
00041 
00042                 virtual Button* createButton(omega::String name, Widget* parent)
00043                 {
00044                         Button* button = new Button(name);
00045                         parent->addChild(button);
00046                         return button;
00047                 }
00048 
00049                 virtual Image* createImage(omega::String name, Widget* parent)
00050                 {
00051                         Image* image = new Image(name);
00052                         parent->addChild(image);
00053                         return image;
00054                 }
00055         };
00056 }; // namespace ui
00057 }; // namespace outk
00058 
00059 #endif
